title: autobuilds: issues with new test 2600
body:
### I did this

Look at the autobuilds at https://curl.se/dev/builds.html.

### I expected the following

Everything green, except for the 110 Solaris warnings.

Instead, test 2600 (added in https://github.com/curl/curl/commit/d55de24dce9d51eac913e20c17022c732124b83f) is failing on the Solaris and NetBSD builders and there are two similar warnings on my Windows builders:

```
In file included from C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/tests/libtest/test.h:34,
from C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/tests/unit/curlcheck.h:24,
from C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/tests/unit/unit2600.c:24:
In function 'test_connect',
inlined from 'test' at C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/tests/unit/unit2600.c:356:5:
C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/include/curl/typecheck-gcc.h:50:15: warning: call to '_curl_easy_setopt_err_long' declared with attribute warning: curl_easy_setopt expects a long argument for this option [-Wattribute-warning]
50 | _curl_easy_setopt_err_long(); \
| ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/include/curl/curl.h:45:7: note: in definition of macro 'CURL_IGNORE_DEPRECATION'
45 | statements \
| ^~~~~~~~~~
C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/tests/unit/unit2600.c:273:3: note: in expansion of macro 'curl_easy_setopt'
273 | curl_easy_setopt(easy, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT_MS, tc->connect_timeout_ms);
| ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```
```
C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/include/curl/typecheck-gcc.h:50:15: warning: call to '_curl_easy_setopt_err_long' declared with attribute warning: curl_easy_setopt expects a long argument for this option [-Wattribute-warning]
50 | _curl_easy_setopt_err_long(); \
| ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/include/curl/curl.h:45:7: note: in definition of macro 'CURL_IGNORE_DEPRECATION'
45 | statements \
| ^~~~~~~~~~
C:/JA/workspace/LIB/_Lib_Tests/cURL_WindowsMaster_Tests_tvcorp/curl-7.87.1-20230203/tests/unit/unit2600.c:274:3: note: in expansion of macro 'curl_easy_setopt'
274 | curl_easy_setopt(easy, CURLOPT_HAPPY_EYEBALLS_TIMEOUT_MS, tc->he_timeout_ms);
| ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

### curl/libcurl version

master

### operating system

Windows 10, NetBSD 9.3, Solaris 10

FYI @icing
